name: Aquatic Cavalry
text: You summon a school of hippocampi (one plus one per 3 caster levels, to a maximum of six at 15th level) to serve as combat-trained mounts. The hippocampi avoid combat if possible but defend themselves if attacked. If any hippocampus attacks, the remaining duration of the spell changes from 1 hour per level to 1 round per level (so if a full 4 hours remained, the hippocampi last for only 4 more rounds).
target_zh: 1匹海马加上1匹海马/3施法者等级
text_zh: 你召唤出一群海马（hippocampi）（数量为1+1/3施法者等级，最多为15级时的6匹; 怪物手册 II 155）来作为经过战斗训练的坐骑。如果可能，海马会尽量避免战斗，但如果受到攻击，它们也会自卫。如果有任何海马发起攻击，这个法术的剩余持续时间会从1小时每等级缩减到1轮每等级（如果还剩有整整4个小时的持续时间，海马仅会再停留4轮）。
